    • 方法详细资料

      • getResource

        public static Resource getResource(String path,
                   ClassLoader classLoader,
                   javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Get Resource from the given path. using DefaultResourceLoader.getResource(String)
        Support：
        1. Standard URL ( @see java.net.URL) Defined by RFC 2396 (http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2396.txt) 
           Some examples: 
   
     http://www.math.com/faq.html
     https://www.math.com/faq.html
     ftp://ftp.is.co.za/rfc/rfc1808.txt
     file:C:/test.dat
     jar:dddddd
     netdoc:sdfffdfdffd
     mailto:mduerst@ifi.unizh.ch
     gopher://spinaltap.micro.com/Weather/California/Los%20Angeles
     支持以上8种协议。参见 JRE -> lib -> rt.jar -> \sun\net\www\protocol
     
     or a relative URI, like:
      file:C:/Windows/system/../system/test.dat
        2. Pseudo URL Defined by this Util, see ResourceUtils.CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX, ResourceUtils.CONTEXTPATH_URL_PREFIX, ResourceUtils.LOCAL_FILE_URL_PREFIX. 
           Some examples: 
   
     classpath:test.dat
     contextpath:WEB-INF/test.dat
     file:C:/test.dat
        参数:
        path - the path to resolve
        classLoader - the ClassLoader to load class path resources with.
        servletContext - the ServletContext to load resources with.
        返回:
        the corresponding Resource object
        另请参阅:
        DefaultResourceLoader.getResource(String), DefaultResourceLoader.getResource(String)

      • getServletContextResource

        public static ServletContextResource getServletContextResource(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                                               String path)

      • getResources

        public static Resource[] getResources(String locationPattern,
                      ClassLoader classLoader,
                      javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
                               throws IOException
        Get Resources from the given locationPattern. using PathMatchingResourcePatternResolver.getResources(String)
        参数:
        locationPattern - the location pattern to resolve
        classLoader - the ClassLoader to load class path resources with.
        servletContext - the ServletContext to load resources with.
        返回:
        the corresponding Resource objects
        抛出:
        IOException - in case of I/O errors

      • getResourcesByServletContextResolver

        public static Resource[] getResourcesByServletContextResolver(String locationPattern,
                                              javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
                                                       throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getResourceInputStream

        public static InputStream getResourceInputStream(String resourceLocation,
                                 ClassLoader classLoader,
                                 javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
                                          throws IOException
        See getResources(String, ClassLoader, ServletContext)
        抛出:
        IOException
        另请参阅:
        getResources(String, ClassLoader, ServletContext), DefaultResourceLoader.getResource(String)
